text: MALDI matrix kits contain pre-weighed tubes of recrystallized matrices and adapted solvent mixtures. They provide standard analytical conditions and eliminate the need for cumbersome daily preparation of fresh matrix. Recrystallized and cation-depleted matrix provides higher sensitivity and improved signal-to-noise ratio when compared to non-recrystallized standard product.

products.title: M001
products.subtitle: αCHCA matrix kit
products.text:
50 eppendorf tubes of recrystallized α-cyano-4-hydroxycinnamic acid (αCHCA) matrix (5 mg each) and one 50 mL solvent vial (50% acetonitrile in water / 0.1% Trifluoroacetic acid) for matrix preparation.


Applications: MALDI-TOF analysis of peptides and proteins, Proteomics
